Comments: Both commands create an OSPFv3 instance with ID 1.
Both commands set the router ID to 1.1.1.1 for the OSPFv3 instance.
Both commands create an OSPFv3 area with ID 0.0.0.1.

Huawei:
interface GigabitEthernet2/0/0
 ipv6 enable
 ipv6 address 2001:db8:2::2/64
 undo shutdown
Comments: Both configurations enable the interface, enable IPv6, and assign the same IPv6 address.

Huawei:
interface GigabitEthernet3/0/0
 ipv6 enable
 ipv6 address 2001:db8:4::1/64
 undo shutdown
Comments: Both configurations enable the interface, enable IPv6, and assign the same IPv6 address.
